title: Nemisis Draft
body: Thank you Riot for not jumping on the band wagon and giving me THE BEST GAMEMODE TO WALK THE EARTH

replies.body: If you can handle waiting half an hour for a game because people dodge when they get selected a champ they hate, like they expected it was never going to happen

Hasn't happened to me when it was first released, or now either. I suspect it has happened once to you and you are judging the gamemode as bad. Stop complaining about everything Riot does, if you don't like the gamemode don't play it.

"Everything Riot does"? lol

For one, I never once bagged out this game mode. You just assumed that. I was merely pointing out the fact that people enter this game mode, expecting to get champs they know how to play, but dodge because they get ones they don't want. Has happened to me and some friends on more than one occasion. Not once did I suggest this was a "bad game mode".
I guess I wasn't really directing it at you, I'm just mad that people call it garbage but then choose to play it and then complain. More talking to a group of people, sorry if I came off butthurt.
All goods, as a mediocre/less than average LoL player, I have a very thick skin, I don't take much personally <3

You generalized the experience of a couple of games to a 'fact' of the game mode. 
You provided nothing other than this negative viewpoint on the mode, so how the hell did you not bag it out? 
That's like me saying 'I'm not gonna bag out Kevin rudd, but he is a tool'
Actually it's nothing like that, but thanks for the input
